contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} {|{{Infobox Ship Begin}} {{Infobox Ship Image |Ship image= |Ship caption= }} {{Infobox Ship Career |Hide header= |Ship country= |Ship flag= [[Image:British-Royal-Fleet-Auxiliary-Ensign.svg|60px|RFA Ensign]] |Ship name= ''Blue Ranger'' |Ship namesake= |Ship ordered= 28 August 1939 |Ship builder= |Ship yard number= |Ship laid down= 26 October 1939 |Ship launched= 29 January 1941 |Ship acquired= |Ship commissioned= 5 June 1941 |Ship decommissioned= June 1966<br />Laid up at Devonport |Ship in service= |Ship out of service= |Ship renamed= |Ship struck= 1975 |Ship reinstated= |Ship homeport= |Ship motto= |Ship nickname= |Ship honours= |Ship fate= Sold commercially in January 1972 and renamed ''Korytsa''<br />Arrived Alliaga for demolition, 8 September 1987 |Ship status= |Ship notes= }} {{Infobox Ship Characteristics |Hide header= |Header caption= |Ship class=[[Ranger class tanker|Ranger-class]] [[Oil tanker|fleet support tanker]] |Ship displacement= {{Convert|6700|LT|t|0|lk=in|abbr=on}} full load |Ship length= {{Convert|365|ft|10|in|m|abbr=on}} |Ship beam= {{Convert|47|ft|m|abbr=on}} |Ship draught= {{Convert|20|ft|2|in|m|abbr=on}} |Ship propulsion=1 Ã— 6-cylinder B&W diesel<br />{{Convert|3500|shp|abbr=on}}<br />1 shaft |Ship speed= {{Convert|13|kn|mph km/h|lk=in}} |Ship range= {{Convert|6000|nmi|km|lk=in|abbr=on}} at {{Convert|13|kn|mph km/h|abbr=on}} |Ship complement=40 |Ship sensors= |Ship EW= |Ship armament= |Ship armour= |Ship notes= }} |} '''RFA ''Blue Ranger'' (A157)''' was a fleet support tanker of the [[Royal Fleet Auxiliary]]. {{DEFAULTSORT:Blue Ranger}} [[Category:Ships of the Royal Fleet Auxiliary]] [[Category:1941 ships]] {{UK-aux-ship-stub}}
